Entry.title: &Automatic Season Check
Entry.tooltip: Automatically check for new seaons every given interval.

Entry.title: Season check &limit
Entry.tooltip: If checking for too many seasons at once, proxer.me may block your ip. To prevent this, limit the amount of checked animes per day (0 equals no limit).

Entry.title: &Clear image cache
Entry.tooltip: If the cache of anime images becomes to big, you can clear by pressing this button. This will delete all cached images.

Entry.title: &Open Animes in browser
Entry.tooltip: Such an action will automatically open the animes relations in your browser.

Entry.title: &Unmark new seasons
Entry.tooltip: Such an action will remove the 'new seasons' mark from the anime, if it had one.

Section.title: Contents

Entry.title: Include &Adult content
Entry.tooltip: When enabled, the applications update-checks will include Adult-Content, like Hentais, H-Mangas and Doujinshi.

Group.title: Adult Relation types
